name: hastiness
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the act of saying or doing things in a hurry, sometimes without the necessary care or thought: He has very few weak points, but one of them is his hastiness and lack of forethought. Bright criticized the hastiness of the decision. See
hasty
More examplesFewer examplesIn her hastiness, she forgot to lock the front door.There was a certain hastiness in naming the suspects.Hastiness in making judgements can have serious consequences.
